titleStmt.title: The case of the promoter of the bill for erecting a court of conscience for the tower hamblets comprehended within the weekly bills, of mortality, &c.
titleStmt.author: Caine, John.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Caine. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
